channel.title: Safety of High/Low Alchers?
channel.description: Hey---I was just wondering about how many of you guys who use the high/low alchers created by scripters on this community have been banned? I really appreciate the scripts, as alching is a very long and tedious burden. I would like to continue using them, but I don't want to risk my account. Again, thanks to the scripters who aide me in Runescape.

item.title: Safety of High/Low Alchers?
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:3, topic:7052”]Yeah that’s true.

They can be detectable if they don’t check for randoms, or make human like mistakes. Plus I have only seen 2 High/Low alchers on this forum.

Mad Cow’s and Pmh100’s.

Mad Cow says he hasn’t tested his, and I’m pretty sure Pmh has. Though Mad Cow is known to be a very good scripter. Take your pick.

Just remember, if you auto, you have a 20% or so posibility to be banned. So don’t forget about the risk…[/quote]I would like to say that if you do it right, you can reduce the to about 10%
You just have to have the right script

Read full topic

item.title: Safety of High/Low Alchers?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Yeah that’s true.

They can be detectable if they don’t check for randoms, or make human like mistakes. Plus I have only seen 2 High/Low alchers on this forum.

Mad Cow’s and Pmh100’s.

Mad Cow says he hasn’t tested his, and I’m pretty sure Pmh has. Though Mad Cow is known to be a very good scripter. Take your pick.

Just remember, if you auto, you have a 20% or so posibility to be banned. So don’t forget about the risk…

Read full topic

item.title: Safety of High/Low Alchers?
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

they probably arent very dewtectable, as long as u log in and off once in a while.

item.description:
@dttee wrote:

Hey—I was just wondering about how many of you guys who use the high/low alchers created by scripters on this community have been banned? I really appreciate the scripts, as alching is a very long and tedious burden. I would like to continue using them, but I don’t want to risk my account.
